root.name: Pride FC: Fighting Championships
root.description: FeaturesOver 25 playable fighters including MMA legends like, Kazushi Sakuraba, Wanderlei Silva, Antonio Rodrigo Nogueira, and Ken Shamrock. Five Game Modes: Exhibition, Grand Prix, Tournament, Survival, and Training. A Create a Fighter Mode that lets you customize everything from appearance and fighting style to entrance music. Authentic ring entrances for every fighter that feature flashing lights, fireworks, camera flashes, and the crowds reaction to the fighter. RosterAkira ShojiAlexander OtsukaAllan GoesCarlos NewtonDan HendersonGary GoodridgeGilbert YvelGuy MezgerIgor VovchanchynHeath HerringEnson InoueKazushi SakurabaKazuyuki FujitaKen ShamrockRicardo AronaDon FryeSemmy SchiltNobuhiko TakadaRenzo GracieAntonio Rodrigo NogueiraRoyce GracieMurilo "Ninja" RuaDaijiro MatsuiWanderlei SilvaTom Erikson
